hero.title: Eco-friendly Waste to Energy Conversion
hero.subtitle: Complete cycle from fat collection to biomethane production with own logistics and digital control

fatSeparators.title: Professional Grease Trap Cleaning and Disposal
fatSeparators.description: Regular maintenance of grease traps for restaurants, cafes and food production facilities. We prevent clogs, fines and unpleasant odors. Complete disposal cycle with environmental certificates.

sewerCleaning.title: High-Pressure Sewer Cleaning from Grease
sewerCleaning.description: Effective removal of grease deposits in pipes using modern high-pressure equipment. We eliminate clogs of any complexity without damaging communications.

biomethane.title: Grid-quality Biomethane (bioCH₄) for Energy and Transport
biomethane.description: We produce environmentally friendly biomethane with 96-97.4% CH₄ concentration for injection into the gas network and vehicle refueling. Certification according to RED II, ISCC, GoO standards.

fullCycle.title: Full Processing Cycle
fullCycle.description: From waste collection to energy and fertilizer production - a closed cycle without losses.

digitalPlatform.title: APUS Digital Platform
digitalPlatform.description: GPS transport control, transparent document flow, CRM integration.

certifiedTech.title: Certified Technologies
certifiedTech.description: Compliance with European RED II, ISCC standards and Guarantees of Origin (GoO) system.

ownLogistics.title: Own Logistics
ownLogistics.description: Fleet of specialized vehicles for prompt service within a 200 km radius.

riskMinimization.title: Risk Minimization
riskMinimization.description: Buy-back scheme from equipment supplier guarantees project stability.

horeca.title: For Restaurants, Cafes and Hotels
horeca.description: Regular grease trap maintenance, emergency sewer cleaning, food waste removal. Compliance with sanitary norms and environmental standards.

municipalities.title: For Municipal Services and Management Companies
municipalities.description: Comprehensive solutions for organic waste disposal, urban sewage maintenance and renewable energy production.

energy.title: For Energy Companies and Gas Stations
energy.description: Stable supplies of grid-quality biomethane for pipeline injection or vehicle refueling. Certificates of origin for ESG reporting.

stats.title: Metan.lv in Numbers
stats.biogasCapacity: Up to 2 MW biogas production capacity
stats.fertilizer: 29,000 tons of organic fertilizers produced per year
stats.serviceRadius: 200 km service radius with own transport

cta.title: Ready to Start Cooperation?
cta.description: Leave a request and our specialist will contact you within 30 minutes for consultation and cost calculation.
